Isabella Rodriguez.description: catching up with her friends Maria and Klaus at Hobbs Cafe (greeting Maria and Klaus as they arrive at Hobbs Cafe) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cafe customer seating

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Maria Lopez and Klaus Mueller are discussing the logistics and accommodations for a mini treasure hunt they plan to organize at the park, including checking with Isabella for any specific needs and confirming the meeting time, as well as finalizing details for a karaoke night and dinner arrangements. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez

Klaus Mueller

Maria Lopez
